Articles.Content:
Hello everyone! I'm Tomcat14, named after the plane in my profile picture, the F-14 Tomcat. I love aviation and planes, the F-14 being my favorite. I've been working on my pilots license irl. But I like rockets and space too! I've been playing KSP for a while now, but now I am really getting into it. I'm putting together a fleet to Duna at the moment in my career game! I hope that space station I am going to push there (under contract) doesn't fall apart during the transfer burn...

So kewl! Thats me. Hi all!

Hello Tomcat14 and welcome to the KSP forums!

There are quite a few aviation buffs around here.  I very much enjoy spaceplanes, myself.

Glad to have you aboard.

Happy landings!

Well i think you'll have a great time in the spaceplane hanger building real planes or maybe

your own original planes anyway have fun with Kerbal Space Program it is truly an amazing game

Happy landings!
